text: Anguis is a member of legless lizards also known as slowworms or blindworms. belonging to the genus Anguidae. Even though they are lizards, slow worms have lost their legs and are usually mistaken for snakes. ==Classification== Subfamily Anguinae *Genus Anguis **Anguis cephalonnicus - Peloponnese Slow Worm **Anguis fragilis Category:Anguids Category:Reptiles of Europe
title: Anguis
